::Battera::

Sh felt the blade slide into her abdoman.  She gasped in pain and 
fear.  She looked at him, then fell to the floor.  Her body shook, 
leaking badly and laying in a puddle of mech fluid.  She whispered,"I 
was here for thepeace talks. I was going to become a maximal..." She 
closed her eyes.  She was filled with fear.  She 
whispered, "Cybershark...I tried....Cybershark" 



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "David Torrey" <Dachande85@m...> wrote:
> ::Dark Prime/CyberShark/Wolveritron::
> 
>     "Ahh, yes," He said noticing Battera. "Battera. I remember you, 
but I'm sure you don't remember me. I saved you once from 
Wolveritron. Well, I'm here to return something, and then I'll be on 
my way."
>     He thrust his Dark sword at Battera's abdomen.
>     CyberShark came into sight of the CF at that moment and began 
rushing to the CF. He was nearly blind with fear.
>     Wolveritron stepped in front of him and extended his blades.
>     "We don't accept Predacons 'round here," He said.
>     CyberShark shoved him out of the way and continued running...
